sections.text:
49-505.Distribution to public libraries.

After the above distribution, the copies of laws and journals remaining in the hands of the county clerk may, upon their application, be distributed to the librarians of any public libraries within the county for whose support an annual tax is levied.

SourceLaws 1907, c. 78, § 5, p. 290;R.S.1913, § 3737;C.S.1922, § 3130;C.S.1929, § 49-505;R.S.1943, § 49-505.
